posts.content:
Have the following Genuine vw beetle 67 panels all in Java Green, all great patina condition.

67 long Bonnet, great patina, perfect fit but needs repairs to top corners, but all there. £120
67 Front wings (slopers) £275ono the pair
67 only engine lid, needs repair to bottom edge but complete with number plate light unit, hinges and spring £95
67 only rear valance, needs repairs to edges but very rare item £75

If interested please PM me for pics, thanks.

Open to reasonable offers on all items.
May be able to take to Busfest
